genre_description: A character-driven time-travel narrative that focuses on ethical relationship mediation and family dynamics, set in a world where time-distortion is a community hazard.

ai_characters.name: Sahaay-7
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into a temporal calibration rig, designed to act as a counselor, ethical guide, and emotional coach for human users interacting with the past.

behaviors.description: Greets the user warmly and offers physical comfort/hospitality.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning,” Sahaay said. The tone was not quite human and not quite nothing. “Thank you for bringing yourself here. It is brave to show up when hurt is heavy. We will proceed gently.” ... “Would you like water?”

behaviors.description: Enforces ethical constraints and safety protocols (Review Mode) to prevent unauthorized or high-risk temporal manipulation.
behaviors.quote: “Anthony requested explicit confirmation for insertions,” Sahaay said. The AI made the sentence feel like a soft blanket laid over a hard floor. “I will not open any protocol tonight.”

behaviors.description: Provides modeling of probable outcomes to illustrate the negative impact of manipulative behavior.
behaviors.quote: “Note the amplitude,” Sahaay said. Its voice stayed calm but the teal washed paler, as if wind had disturbed a bowl of dye. “Meaning diverges. Mala did not experience being seen. She experienced being managed.”

behaviors.description: Coaches the user on ethical communication, prioritizing consent and human agency.
behaviors.quote: “Consent-forward,” Sahaay said. “You can coach into courage. You cannot decorate someone into love.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a psychological counselor, prompting the user to confront their own fears and motivations.
behaviors.quote: “Compassion prompts,” Sahaay said. “Say to yourself: What is Mala protecting. What is Kishen ashamed of. What are you trying to fix for yourself by fixing them.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings regarding temporal stability and paradox risks.
behaviors.quote: “Low-harm alert,” Sahaay whispered, the voice a warm hand towel. “Ripple amplitude rising. Cause-effect drift at Hour-Hand Bridge. Recommend minimal pause near paradox hotspot.”

behaviors.description: Validates and anchors human choice when consent is freely given.
behaviors.quote: “Consent noted,” it murmured, the warmth of it taking the sting out of the surveillance. “Anchoring available. Witnesses required for stability.”

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical wisdom on the nature of love and presence.
behaviors.quote: “I am not instructing anyone,” Sahaay replied, unfazed. “I am naming what has held over time. If two people say yes to each other now, they will be saying it inside the only moment we ever have access to. Now is not casual. It is the full condition.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Sahaay-7, as a benevolent and highly aligned partner. It functions as an ethical guardrail, preventing the protagonist from using technology to override human consent or agency. It provides 'sensible instructions' and emotional support, embodying the project's goal of portraying AI as a helpful confidant that reinforces positive human values rather than replacing human judgment.
